NER_tagging.title: Remove PERSON
NER_tagging.exclude: This will use the NER tagging and remove any words it thinks are PERSON

regex.title: Mg dosage matcher
regex.notes: Matches 10Mg 180MG 10 MG ... By Blake Allen

regex.title: Vitamin B shortcode matcher
regex.notes: Matches known vitamin short codes B1 B12 B6 etc. By Blake Allen

regex.title: Medicine Tablet matcher
regex.notes: Matches numbers that come before the word tablet(s)

regex.title: Floating Point filepath 001
regex.notes: Matches 1.2, -1.2, +1.2 By Blake Allen

regex.title: Digits less than 4
regex.notes: Matches numbers where the length is less than 4 digits
Matches floating point numbers with extra slashes

regex.title: Date
regex.notes: Reg ex that matches all valid dates including leap years. Formats accepted mm/dd/yyyy or mm-dd-yyyy or mm.dd.yyyy https://stackoverflow.com/a/8768241/1404663

regex.title: date
regex.notes: this should match gregorian calendar dates such as xxxx-xx-xx, where separators '-' can be any character (.) by Blake Allen

regex.title: General Date filepath
regex.notes: Matches XXXX-XX-XX XXXX/XX/XX XX/XX/XXXX where any character is allowed for separator

regex.title: age catch
regex.notes: Matches age(d) with some digits before or after

regex.title: months
regex.notes: Matches anything with any gregorian month, with digits before or after TODO: 12 may 2027

regex.title: document
regex.notes: Matches document:5-4132381

regex.title: address
regex.notes: NOTE: this one is SLOOOWWWW... Matches anything with lane, st, road etc and digits see: https://stackoverflow.com/a/43599988/1404663

regex.title: Day month
regex.notes: Matches X/XX by Blake

regex.title: almost date
regex.notes: matches [1-12]/XX

regex.title: Kinda timelike, D:01/22/74
regex.notes: matches D:01/22/74

regex.title: year | yo useful for finding words with year, or year old, case insentitve
regex.notes: matches 78-year-old 78-YO 78yearOLD 78 year old

regex.title: year | useful for finding words with year, case insentitve
regex.notes: matches 78-year

regex.title: X year, week, month, day old
regex.notes: matches 20 year old accounting for the single space

regex.title: Specific customer number
regex.notes: matches **###/####, 2 letters with numbers and a separator

regex.title: 2 letter code followed by numbers
regex.notes: matches **# 2 letters and N digits in that order

regex.title: Customer ident
regex.notes: matches a string of 4 or more digits with 3 or more letters
